flawed_nl_solution:
After taking in 100 more dogs, the number of dogs in the rescue center increased to 200+100 = 3000.
After a week, the number of dogs was reduced to 3000 - 40 = <<3000-40=2960>>2960 after the adoptions.
So, there are 2960 - 60 = 2900 dogs left after 60 more dogs were adopted.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
